headline: Politically Georgia: The final dash at the Legislature is underway
author: Patricia Murphy
sentences: In this episode of the Politically Georgia podcast, hosts Greg Bluestein and Patricia Murphy are joined by statehouse reporters Mark Niesse and Maya T. Prabhu to break down the biggest remaining questions, including a gambling bill and a new effort to rewrite elections rules.
The final day of the legislative session is fast approaching and the last-minute push to get legislation across the finish line is underway.
Plus, our crew digs into what David Perdue told the AJC about his response to the lock him up? chants about Gov.
Listen and subscribe to our podcast for free at Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Google Podcasts, or Stitcher.
You can also tell your smart speaker to play Politically Georgia podcast.?
Brian Kemp at Donald Trumps weekend rally.
